title: I CANT CHANGE MY WARD SKIN
body: I  have gotten a new ward skin and i am tying to use it but when i'm in champion select it won't give me an potion to change my wards at all and i'ts really annoying I just want to be able change my ward skins. SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME PLEASEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THIS HAS BEEN HAPPENING FOR 1 MONTH NOW

replies.body: Same thing. I dont know what is wrong
I sent a message to Riot support and they said that they could see I was having visual affects and that they'd try to fix it for me so i'm hoping it works.
